title: Dragon Con EFForums Audio 2014 - OGG
description:
Audio from the 2014 Electronic Frontier Forums track at Dragon*Con.

33+ Hours of audio covering everything from the Edward Snowden and the NSA, Ingress, and Revenge Porn, through cryptography (specifically CIA's Kryptos) and P2P lawsuits and Copyright Trolls, to 'how to Jailbreak your iPhone, and 10 rules for dealing with police encounters

Also includes the annual favourite, Hacking 101

More details, including a full program list is at http://eff.dragoncon.org/2014-schedule/

-
OGG format (MP3 format available in another torrent)
Audio released under a CC-BY-NC-SA license.
